name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Leroy FEARS, Appellee

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Leroy FEARS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of April, 2008, the October 15, 2007 order of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County in the above-captioned matter is VACATED. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 909(B)(2)(a). This matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County for further proceedings.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
947 A.2d 710
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Leroy FEARS, Appellee.
No. 562 CAP.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 22, 2008.
